1.content:
Kristen's body began to throb, her belly began to bulge and rumble loudly, she thought that she was a goner.
"Please, little alien, don't burst out of my belly and kill me!" she yelled, poking her stomach.
Suddenly the throbbing stopped, and the pain subsided, the alien let out a loud yelp that screeched across the state.
"Woah that was loud," said Kristen, "But I'm alive!"
Her belly began to churn and digest the little alien, Kristen smiled, and began to stroke it lightly.
She then bent down, to see what had happened when the alien tried to get in, her perfect, cute outie was gone, and was replaced with a deep, dark innie. "Awww, now I have the bellybutton of a 500 pound fat guy. She stroked her finger around it, but then, GLOMPH!!!
"HEY my fingers stuck!!!" Let go!" she yelled, thinking the alien grabbed her finger, "Why don't you pipe down and digest already!" she said while giving her belly a smack with the other hand, her finger was instantly released.
"But wait, the alien is dead, did my innie just suck my finger inside?" She began to walk around, pulling up her shirt and tying it to reveal her open stomach. She walked over to a tree, sitting down and taking a break, wiping the sweat off her forehead. She layed her hand on her gurgling stomach, which calmed down, her intestines where now working on the little alien. But Kristen was still hungry, she looked up, seeing a large birds nest, maybe a hawk or a falcon's. "Hmmm," she said, while clutching hold of the tree, suddenly without much strength, she pulled the tree from the ground, sending the eggs flying, right into her open, fascinated mouth. Gulp GUlp GULP! All three where sent down to her belly in one easy gulp. Kristen dropped the tree in astonishment, looking down at her bulging belly where the three hawk eggs where settled. She put her hand on her belly, feeling the lumps that where the eggshells slowly being melted away by her digestive acids.
"Woah, did I just do that?"
Swooping from the sky was mama hawk and daddy hawk, seeing that their babies where swallowed by this human, they dove straight for Kristen who began to scream and run away, but not at the same speed as normal, she saw that she ran at 70 mph, but still at that speed, the hawks where gaining. Kristen running faster and faster, burning up the energy from the food in her belly, her metabolism sped up and her belly began to shrink, digesting the eggs, shells and all.

Kristen stopped and turned around, the hawks where still gaining, she screamed as they headed right for her face. Then she stopped, and fainted.

Kristen awoke, at three A.M lying on the field, knowing what she had experienced was not a dream, and all she knew right now was that she had to take a dump.

11.content:
Kristen pulled up her pants and flushed her toilet, her three sisters where fast asleep in their seperate rooms.
Looking at her waste she noticed that what she experienced was not a dream, and both of those large hawks where instantly swallowed whole. A few skull flakes remained from the family of hawks, and Kristen flushed the toilet.

Walking out of the bathroom, she slowly tiptoed to her bed, and went to sleep.

Kristen began to run, run and run, darkness surrounded her and all she could hear was the fluttering of wings, then large cracks and smashes, and screams.
She looked down at her feet, dozens of buildings where smashed under her toes. She screamed, stumbling, she fell on her ass, and hearing a large crack she looked down, seeing that she smashed her own house.
She screamed again running farther and farther away until she slipped into nothingness. Out of the darkness came an image of herself, a moving image. She was running around rampant in tight clothes around the streets. Suddenly a very scary looking man approached her, and began to talk to her, he pulled out a large knife.
Kristen saw a large grin slide across her own face, as she overcame the man, grabbing his shoulders and instantly stunned him with her own beautiful seductive smile. The man dropped his blade, stunned, Kristen brought him into an alleyway.
There she lifted the man, above her mouth, and let him go, to her surprise he slid into her throat effortlessly and was gulped down to Kristen's hungry belly.
There she lay against the wall of a building, stroking her huge belly, which grumbled and sloshed the man around.
"Okay little man, here is your final sight" she said.
Then her belly shrank, as the man was completely digested in about 2 minutes and was moved into her small intestine. The end of the dream was a vision of a giant Kristen, swallowing crowds of people, ending up with the same fates as the man before. "AAAHHH!!!" Kristen woke up screaming.
"What the..... It's 10:30, I'm late for school!!!"

111.content:
Kristen-then rushed to catch the school bus and started what would otherwise be a mundane day of her normal life. When she arrived at her public school, she trudged to her locker and got ready to go to Spanish class. Suddenly, as she was arranging her books, her ex-boyfriend, Toby walked up to her-a look of mischief in his eyes. "Hey Kristen-he said leaning against the locker next to her. "Wow! You're looking unusually hot today" he said leering down her chest and studying her down to her exposed midriff. "Are you doing anything later tonight because I've got a few tickets to tonight's concert and my dad's letting me drive his..."

Kristen then slammed her locker shut and interrupted his invitation "Don't even think about it Toby-I broke up with you for a reason-you're a creep and a loser and I wouldn't be caught dead with you again!" She then stormed off to class when suddenly an wonderful, awful idea entered her head and she stopped abruptly. "Toby-Wait!" she said wheeling around and running back to the defeated boy who had already started to exit the scene of his rejection. "I'm sorry-I've had a weird day and I didn't mean to be such a bitch-Yeah I'd love to go the concert with you tonight, but first, could you stop by my house first-there's something cool I want to show you tonight before we go to the concert." she said sweetly betraying nothing but pure intentions in her voice. The teenage boy nodded eagerly in agreement and then walked off to his class.Kristen did the same with a devious smile on her face as she walked through the hallways-tonight promised to be quiet the date night indeed...

Kristen was readying herself for the big night, when she heard the doorbell ring and knew, of course, who it was. She did one last inspection of herself in he mirror before going down to greet Toby. Looking from top to bottom-she gazed vainly at the image presented before herself. She had added purple highlights to her otherwise blonde hair and was wearing a significant amount makeup that night to accentuate her already pretty face. She was also wearing a short black shirt that looked perfect for a concert and fit tightly around her exposing the contours of her small, but firm breasts and, of course, also revealed both her sexy midriff and cute navel. Her jean short fit a little bit loosely, but still revealed the perfect shape of her cute, round, little butt and her long, tanned legs.

Nodding in approval at the image in the mirror-she ran down to answer the door and greeted Toby eagerly "Hey Toby" she said doing a quick but still thorough inspection of her date for the night. Toby stood before her in similar concert type clothes-he wore a black t-shirt representing the band they'd be seeing that night and and tight jeans. He was neither the skinniest or the most heavily built of boys his age-he had some muscles on him-the result of his involvement in high school sports but not overly bulky or ripped-in fact he almost looked a little bit stocky given that his stout frame contrasted with his short height of 5"7, actually at least a couple inches shorter than Kristen. However, there was no denying that Toby was still quiet cute-he had golden blonde hair that streamed from side to side on his head. He also had a nice tan that contrasted nicely with the otherwise soft, sweet features of his face and illuminated his blue eyes. Kristen licked her lips looking at her "delectable" date for the night-this would indeed be quiet a treat...

"Come one, you dork" she kidded "I need to show you something cool my parents got for me before we go-it's up in my room so hurry up and follow me." The two rushed up the stairs to her bedroom and closed the door. Kristen the turned around and faced her ex-boyfriend...

11111.content:
She gazed up and down Toby, her belly growling at the sight of such nice meal before her. "Toby-I've recently acquired some new abilities and they're almost impossible to explain so I"ll just show you". With that-she took out an enormous packaged turkey that had been laying on her bed. Holding it above her head-her jaw opened and expanded like a snake's to engulf and then swallow the massive amount of meat. She then belched loudly as the turkey instantly digested into her perfect little stomach. Beaming with pride-she then gazed back at the now stunned Toby-"Pretty impressive, huh" she laughed.

Toby looked with a stunned, if not somewhat frightened expression. "Kristen-that's just amazing-not mention kind of creepy-how'd you learn to do that!" he gasped.

"Well-it's a long story-but a alien burrowed into my belly button and granted me special powers so now I have the ability to eat massive objects with my mouth or belly. Oh and I also have the ability to grow myself or shrink people" she smirked. With that-her hands began to glow and she stepped forward and touched Toby and within the blink of an eye he had vanished. Well-vanished that is into a minuscule one inch figure now standing helplessly in the palm of her still glowing hand. Kristen brought the tiny hunk up to her face and laughed.

11222.content:
Sitting against a wall in the alley she sighed, rubbing her growling tummy.
Suddenly a few large, dangerous looking men began to walk towards her. They stopped and began whispering to eachother, Kristen slid a sly grin across her face, and began to lick her lips.
"Chris go get her," said one of them, "Yeah Chris, tap that, I bet she has lots of money too," said another. The one supposedly named Chris aproached Kristen.
"Hey baby," he said while pulling out his knife, just like in the dream.

Kristen stood up immediately, hoping this would work, she grabbed his shoulders.
The man dropped his knife screaming a Kristen's strength crushing his shoulders. She then, lifted him up over her head as he kept screaming in pain, "Please lady! NO!" he yelled. But Kristen was to happy to answer as she opened up her mouth wide and let him slip in, her jaw detached like a snake and he went down in a single gulp, screaming all the way.
He had entered her tight stomach which was huge now, Kristen began to stroke her stomach as the man continued to scream and kick.
"Help, AHHH HELP IT BURRNNSS!!!"
Her stomach began to growl as it began to digest its latest meal.
Kristen eyed the other two thugs, who where staring motionlessly at her distended belly.
One of them pulled out his knife, " Are you crazy?! This girl's a freak!" The other guy said.
"I gotta save Chris!"
The man began to run at Kristen, while the other guy tailed close behind, yelling at him to stop.
Kristen licked her lips, and smiled.
The man jumped, but Kristen was already upon him, breaking both his arms in the process, and swallowed him down whole just like she did Chris. He entered her now gigantic stomach, joining Chris in the kicking and screaming. The third guy began to run, "Oh no you don't" said Kristen, as she leapt 30 ft in the air and landed on him, belly and all. "AHHHHH!!!!" screamed the guy, who was now paralyzed. Kristen got off of him and lifted him up above her head, "well now, at least you won't kick sweetie" she said before gulping him down whole.
There where now three large men inside of her belly.
She went back to the wall that she was at before the whole situation, and sat down, stroking her belly as it grumbled and groaned. She let out a belch before saying her final goodbyes to the men inside of her stomach.
She then layed back and fell asleep, letting her latest meal digest slowly, and painfully.

She ran out the door and behind her house, looking around in the distance she could see a cattle ranch, remembering some old unmarried geezer lived there with a few cows. The cows where too old to give milk or calves and the grumpy old man was too lazy to sell them so he treated them as pets. He also had a sterile bull, still having its masculinity it became angry occasionaly to try and impress the cows. The bull was old, but was very strong, but Kristen took it as a challenge, she would use the farm to test out her powers and get a good meal out of it too. Her belly rumbled loudly, and she patted it, "Hehe, this is going to be fun."

1131.content:
She ran to the cattle ranch, the cows where outside grazing, while the bull was tied up, the grumpy old geezer sat on his porch sipping a beer and staring off into space.
The moment he saw Kristen he pulled out his shotgun, "Hey, You little bitch! Get Away From My Godamn property! Unless your coming here to wash my dishes you little whore!" he yelled.
Kristen glared at the man, he usually yelled these kinds of things at her and her sisters, but now Kristen had the power to shut him up.
"Didn't Ya hear me you dumb skank! Get over here and Kiss my ass, thats all your good for!"
Kristen's anger mixed with her hunger, and she ran head on at the man, who aimed his shotgun.
BOOOM! the bullets screeched through the air, but had no affect, Kristen was upon the man, grabbed his shotgun and threw it away.
"Please, don't *cough hurt me *cough," wheezed the man.
Kristen knew he was faking just to get some sympathy, "Don't worry old man, I'm not gonna hurt you.... yet"
She got some rope and tied him to a chair and layed him on the cattle field where his cattle angrily looked up and Kristen.
The cows where mad and began to run for Kristen, the perfect chance for her to test her powers.
The first cow came charging at her and before she knew it she was conked in the back of the head.

11311.content:
Her eyes opened slightly to see the old man's ugly warty face, her mouth was tied up and her legs and and arms where tied up to a scarecrow post.
She was placed in the middle of the field, unable to move because lack of food made her weak. She stared the man in the face, "Hehe, dumb sluts never learn, I don't go down easy and I am always in charge of my women," he said, and before she knew it he opened the barn, and the cows came running at her hot pink belly shirt, "Get her girls!"
She closed her eyes, Glomph, GLOmph, GLOMPH!!!!
"Ohh, my poor belly," she said, imagining the cows horns rammed through it, she opened her eyes to see her extremely large belly sloshing and digesting a new meal. She noticed a cows leg sticking out of what appeared to be her bellybutton, "What the hell!?" she said, she then flexed her belly and the cows leg was slurped in.
The cows continued to kick and groan loudly in pain as they fought for room in Kristen's cramped belly. Her stomach let out one of the largest groans ever, and a gas bubble slithered up her throat and out her mouth, BUUUURRRRP!!!
Being to much weight for the post to hold it broke, freeing Kristen, and with a belly full of cows she could easily get revenge on the old man. Just like before when she swallowed the eggs she looked down at her belly and on command it quickly digested the cows, and her stomach was returned to normal size, "Hmmm, I wonder if I can do that to get them through my intestines quicker too," she said to herself.
Now full of energy she once again ran for the old man, but before she could get within 30 feet of him, he released the bull, but Kristen was ready.
There he came, charging, with his massive shoulders that where strong enough to pull a truck and his horns which could pierce through a brick wall.
Kristen stood in place, wiping the drool from her lips, she was hungry for more.
She grabbed the bull by the horns, litteraly and in a short quarrel of strength she lifted him up off the ground and over her mouth, which welcomed him, she slowly gulped down the bull, taking her about two minutes to get his torso in, then the last bit of the bull vanished from the outside world and he layed in her stomach motionless, knowing that she had won the battle.
He was digested quickly and peacefuly, becoming a small bit of fat on her ass like the cows.
She rubbed her trim stomach, just as skinny as before, and just as sexy.
Now she had to take care of that old man, but how?

Kristen walked over to the cowering old man, "Please, I really mean it! I'm sorry!" he yelled.
Kristen kicked off her sandal and stepped on the mans chest, "You're not sorry, and who's dominant now?"
She shoved her foot in his face, and after that session of humiliation she knelt down on her knees.
The man just stared at her blankly, not even blinking.
"Well, what are you waiting for? Get in!" she yelled while pointing to her belly.
The old man began to sob, he was the puppet to his fate, he could run away now but Kristen would always be pulling the strings and she could easily swallow him whole using her own force.
Her belly grumbled loudly for its oncoming meal.
The old man placed his hands on the smooth skin of Kristen's belly, he could feel the rumbles coming from deep inside of it, he placed two of his fingers into her bellybutton which was very elastic like, he pulled outward with both fingers so her bellybutton was about the size of a tennis ball, he then gripped the soft edges with his hands and pulled harder until it was the size of a basketball, Kristen's tummy streched with her bellybutton like a snakes gullet stretches with its mouth. He took a look at Kristen who was grinning at him, and then he put his leg in, then he slipped his whole right side in and before he knew it her bellybutton sucked him in.
Kristen's tummy was once again filled, and it grumbled happily as it sloshed the screaming man around, her navel returned to normal size in an instant, and Kristen layed down in the field and rubbed her groaning stomach.
"Now to the old man in my tummy I bid you adue, because my stomach will be digesting you," she said while giggling and rubbing her belly.
"and I'll be sure to be digesting you nice and slow."
"Please let me out! HELP!" he screamed while kicking at her stomach walls, "Okay I'll admit it women are better than men!"
"Hehe, you better believe it sweetie, but acting like that isn't getting you anywhere but my small intestine," said Kristen as she layed a hand on her groaning belly, she dozed off to sleep.
113112.title: Puppet to his fate

choices: Kristen chases him down, no loose ends..
Kristen lets him get to town to stir up even more fun, and even more food!
1131122.content:
Kristen awoke suddenly to an early evening sky, the sun beginning to set and the stars starting to show.

As she sat up in the middle of the field and it seemed to her that everything was clearer, sharper somehow.

And then she heard what had woken her up, the sound of an engine from a truck approaching the farm. Realising it belonged to the farmers 4 sons she licked her lips at thought of all that muscle on them and ran super fast into their house to find some new clothes from the farmers ex-wifes collection.

--

Drawing up to the house the 4 sons were getting increasingly agitated. One there were none of their farmers cows in the fields, two the house was pitch black, and three the front door was open. As they got out they each pulled out weapons, the eldest had his shotgun, two has knives, and the youngest a baseball bat.

Spreading out they went to search the house, this was their biggest mistake.

--

Giggling from her vantage point in one of the bedrooms upstairs, Kristen still couldnt get over her amazing her eyesight had become, she could now see perfectly at night! Even funnier was that the farmers boys were splitting up on their search, she almost wished they'd stay together so she could try taking them all on at once.

Seeing the eldest of them come into the house on his own she moved silently out onto the landing, and when he started coming up the stairs, jumped down behind him.

As he swung round he fired his shotgun, the impact of which sent Kristen flying back onto the couch in the living room.

--

Running into the house at the sound of the shot, the brothers crowded round the girl laying on the couch. She wore a torn black T-shirt, spandex hot pants which looked like their dead mom's and the younger brothers new trainers.

''Got her good with my shotgun'' grinned the eldest.

''Then why aint there any blood or guts eh?'' said the youngest.

''Because you boys can't beat a girl'' purred the feminine voice before them.

--

Now Kristen really was shocked, she could un-consciously absorb bullets! She was so shocked that were it not the perfect opportunity to get all 4 guys together, she'd have burst out laughing right then and there on the staircase.

Instead she'd vaulted back with her super strong legs and performed a flying landing on the couch.

As she lay there with her eyes shut she could smell the other brothers come in, hear the rhythm of their pulses and almost taste how yummy they'd be.

So when the perfect opportunity arose (when they noticed the obvious) she decided to make a dramatic rise from the dead. Taunting the boys she slowly got up off the sofa, rubbing her hands over her belly and grinning like a cheshire cat.

The boys stood dumbfounded, and then one of the middling brothers lashed out with his knife. Spinning round Kristen leaped up in the air and took the knife point in the belly button, sucking it in and digesting it instantly (after all, after bullets, whats a knife?) and then pulling him into a crushing embrace. As he struggled against her slim arms, the others rushed forward and tried to pull her arms off him.

''Come on boys, surely all of your can beat widdle old meeeeee'' she teased, slowly increasing the pressure and making her victim gasp for air.

Before he could pass out though she let go and did a spinning kick that sent him flying into the wall behind, and then proceeded to grab each of the other three brothers, pull them together and laugh as they struggled against her.

Getting bored (and very hungry!) Kristen sighed and sucked the three brothers into her stomach, which stuck out 4 metres in front of her.

Glancing to the surviving brother she grinned and said ''watch this! now you see whats left of them! now you dont!'' and with a crunch her stomach digested the brothers, her stomach back to being perfectly toned and Kristen feeling even more powerful.

Recoiling the horror the remaining brother ran out the house and through the fields as Kristen strutted after him whistling to herself as she considered her options..

125.content:
Steve couldnt help but sigh as he drove home, another job interview failed and he was rapidly running out of cash. At 25 years old, middling build and in the wrong end of the state he really was at his wits end.

So stressed and out and preoccupied was his mind that he didn't notice the young blond step out from the hedge row in front of him, and subsequently hit her.

Thankfully though he was only doing 25 miles an hour. Screeching to a halt he burst out the door and ran back to where the girl was, pausing for a moment to take her in, she was pretty cute and very slim, though the bruises marred the effect.

Though as he stood there staring.. the bruises seemed less and less bad, for a moment he though she was healing! And then, she opened her eyes.. and that pretty face took on one heck of a scowl as she jumped up fast and started yelling at him.

''WHAT THE HELLS YOUR PROBLEM! DONT YOU LOOK WHEN YOU DRIVE!'' she screamed.

Steve couldnt help but laugh at this slim banshee and told her to shove off and mind her own business.

''No,'' she said, ''YOU shove off'' Steve laughed momentarily as she raised her hands up and pushed against his chest, that laugh cut short as he barrelled backwards at 50 miles an hour into his car windscreen.

As he lay there groaning he noticed the girl look at her slim arms with shock, then she looked up at him and the smile that crept up her lips made him almost lose his bowel control. Getting into his car he hurriedly started the engine and sped off, accelerating to 80 miles an hour, glancing into the rear view mirror he couldnt see any sign of the blond.

It was at the moment he knocked on his side window, the effect was like a shotgun going off and his face was cut deep by the flying glass. Losing control of his car he skidded off the road and into a field, and as he lay there he saw the blond bitch strut towards him, not a single bruise was on her tight body, she didnt even appear out of breath from running.

She ripped the door off like it was made of paper, tore him out of his seat and straddled him, her growling belly next to his face.

''By the way,'' she purred, ''I'm Kirsten and I'm hungry'' and to Steve's horror, he found himself being sucked into her belly button.

--

Standing up straight, and with her stomach contracting back down to its normal flat self Kirsten blinked in shock as she realised what she'd just done.

''What the... that... that was like... by instinct..''
